"The Lebanese judiciary must issue verdicts without hesitation or fear against those who attack the army," he said.
"The army can not complete its tasks without providing an environment based on the axioms established by the founding fathers"
"The need to develop a defensive strategy and address the issue of weapons, Trtz the Lebanese army and combine the national capabilities to counter the schemes of the Israeli enemy"
"The army protects and does not attack and builds and does not destroy The state will not accept to force the army to give up his duty"

"No to indiscriminate weapons and yes to the political conflict flexible and open Yes to the neutrality of Lebanon on the policy of axes and not neutralize the issues of the Arabs right, including Palestine"
Sleiman in Army Day speech: "The judicial should without fear nor hesitation issue verdicts on those who target the army"
The army protects and does not attack. It builds and does not destroy. The State will not accept that the Army be forced to give up its role
The army is a fair and capable force that works in accordance with the law and accepts being held accountable through legal means only

The terrorist organization had a blatant plan in the month of Ramadan.
In order not to give this opportunity, our security forces took preliminary action and entered an intense struggle.
Unfortunately, we have martyrs weaving our hearts.
I wish all of you mercy from God, and condolences to your families and all the nation.
Yesterday I visited Istanbul, Hamamönü, one of the most featured historical districts of Ankara, before my departure.
The old Ankara houses have begun to be re-invented, and they are very beautiful.
But the main visit was to see Ulucanlar Prison turned into a museum.
Knowing the old state of Ulucanlar; In 1970 I went to a friend who was lying there.
We started from the famous Hilton Ward, where the late Prime Minister Ecevit was also staying, toured the isolation cells, courtyards and wards.
There were painful memories in each corner. http://t.co/djvzpzqh
The Turkish people who have passed the way through the prison; Letters, articles, decisions about them ... http://t.co/U977pzfU
Politicians, thinkers, intellectuals, journalists, religious scholars, youth leaders ... http://t.co/WXmDBUZ4
Ulucanlar once again reminded me of how precious it is to be a democratic state of law.
So that those who live in those cells and the wards will not live forever ...
... we must protect our democracy and our rights with jealousy. http://t.co/g2c8nhxd
Ulucanlar is a living monument that shows that there can be nothing but persecution where democracy and justice are not.
I congratulate everyone who has been a part of the museum, especially Altındağ Municipality.
